chapters.title: Chapter 57: A Rabbit for SupperEpilogue: And After
chapters.info: Him who will Destroy, p. 843—According to the Prophecies of the Shadow, a man who will be brought to freedom of the First Among Vermin on the day the last days of the Blacksmith's Pride shall come. Editor's note: it is unclear who this character is in the real world. I would guess Rand, but he does not seem to fit the rest of the prophecy.
